description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Chicken with Fresh Pineapple & Red Onion recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ chicken,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pineapple,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chargrilled Chicken with Fresh Pineapple & Red Onion Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Cut each chicken fillet in half through the centre, forming 2 thin slices. Place into a shallow ceramic dish. Add dressing and turn to coat well. Set aside for 20 minutes.
Heat a barbecue chargrill and hot plate on medium heat. Cook chicken for 2 minutes on each side or until charred and cooked through. Cook pineapple on chargrill for 1 minute on each side.

Meanwhile, heat oil on a hotplate. Add onion wedges and cook, stirring often until golden and tender. Layer chicken, pineapple and onion onto plates, repeating layers. Drizzle with a little extra dressing. Serve with salad.
